metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25588 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Binutils. The field `the_bfd` of `asymbol`struct is uninitialized in the `bfd_mach_o_get_synthetic_symtab` function, which may lead to an application crash and local denial of service.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
